derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French orfreis, from a medieval Latin alteration of auriphrygium, from Latin aurum 'gold' + Phrygius 'Phrygian' (also used in the sense 'embroidered')

means.word_mean: 1. a richly embroidered edging on an ecclesiastical vestment
